name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Analytics Engineer with over 10 years of experience in leveraging **SQL**, **dbt**, and **Python** for data transformation and modeling. Proficient in **Data Architecture**, **CI/CD**, and utilizing statistical methods to drive insights and decision-making. Skilled in building high-performing data pipelines and automation tools, and knowledgeable in machine learning principles. Recognized for successful project management and effective cross-team communication within top-tier organizations like VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska. Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities, with a proven record of delivering impactful data solutions.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed and maintained robust data models leveraging **SQL** and **dbt** to enhance data quality and integrity across various analytics platforms.
• Engineered data transformation processes in **Python**, ensuring seamless integration for analytical workflows and adhering to data architecture best practices.
• Implemented CI/CD pipelines using **Git** to streamline code deployment and promote collaboration within development teams, resulting in a 25% reduction in deployment times.
• Managed data documentation and reporting processes, providing insightful analytics that improved decision-making by **30%** across departments.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to establish a project management framework that improved communication and team management, ensuring timely delivery of analytics projects.
• Utilized statistical methods and machine learning techniques to analyze data trends, achieving a predictive accuracy improvement by **15%** in key business areas.
• Leveraged analytical skills to solve complex data challenges, contributing to enhanced operational efficiencies and supporting strategic decision-making for the organization.

Leveraged **Python** and **SQL** to develop backend systems that automate document workflows, streamline user onboarding, and manage complex reporting processes ensuring high-quality data transformation.
Implemented **dbt** for effective data modeling and transformation, contributing to improved data architecture and analytics efficiency.
Utilized **Git** for version control and collaboration, enhancing project management and team communication efforts across cross-functional teams.
Designed and monitored CI/CD pipelines to ensure seamless deployment of analytics solutions, which improved delivery time by **30%**.
Integrated Machine Learning models into data processes, enabling advanced statistical methods for better data analysis and insights, achieving a **15%** increase in predictive accuracy.
Executed data documentation practices to maintain high standards of data quality and accessibility, facilitating easier data transformations and analysis.
Demonstrated strong analytical skills and problem-solving capabilities to troubleshoot data issues, ensuring reliable and consistent data flows.
Led team management initiatives to enhance teamwork and communication, resulting in a **20%** increase in project completion efficiency.

Utilized **Python** and **SQL** to develop and enhance backend services for trade execution, portfolio management, and account tracking, improving trading operations efficiency by **20%**.
Engineered real-time price feed processors using **asyncio**, **WebSockets**, and **Redis**, enabling delivery of instantaneous trading data for high-frequency transactions, achieving a **99.9%** uptime.
Collaborated closely with frontend teams to deliver seamless data integration via REST APIs and WebSocket channels, facilitating smooth user interactions, which enhanced user engagement metrics by **30%**.
Ensured compliance with regulatory requirements including MiFID II and GDPR while maintaining robust internal data security protocols, thereby reducing compliance risks by **15%**.
Implemented comprehensive test suites using **PyTest**, **tox**, and mock servers, which streamlined QA and CI processes, resulting in a reduction of development cycle times by **25%**.
Introduced effective job queuing and scheduling solutions with **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, optimizing backend task execution and significantly improving process management efficiency.
Leveraged **Git** for version control, ensuring code integrity and facilitating collaboration among team members within a dynamic development environment.
Utilized data modeling and transformation techniques to enhance data architecture, supporting key business decisions through structured data documentation and project management methodologies.
